name: browser_navigate
description: Navigate to a URL. By default reuses an existing tab; set newTab: true to open in a new tab.

viewId.description: Target browser tab ID. If omitted, uses the last interacted tab.

position.description: IMPORTANT: Set to "side" if user mentions "side", "beside", "side panel", or "side by side". Opens browser in side editor group. Defaults to "active" (current editor group).

take_screenshot_afterwards.description: When true, takes a screenshot after navigation completes. Defaults to false.

newTab.description: When true, creates a new tab before navigating instead of reusing an existing tab. Defaults to false.
